QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Grizzly Hills!
QuestData.Description: We've received a request for help from our base in the Grizzly Hills. Go to see Conqueror Krenna.$B$BShe's attempting to secure all of the natural resources. Just watch your back around her. The word is that she's aggressive even for an orc.$B$BYou can reach her by traveling east from Dragonblight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Present yourself to Conqueror Krenna at Conquest Hold in the Grizzly Hills.
QuestData.RewardText: Who are you?$B$BTell me why I shouldn't split you in two where you stand!
